title: Indian Railway Finance Corporation's 2021-22 Profit Rises 38% - NDTV Profit
content: Indian Railway Finance Corporation's 2021-22 Profit Rises 38%  NDTV Profit
description: Indian Railway Finance Corporation Limited (IRFC) on Friday posted a 37.90 per cent growth in its profit after tax at Rs 6,090 crore in 2021-22
